column4: alright... now i've got <0>kernal panic - not syncing attempted to kill init!
alright... so if i cant use the live cd, how do i install it?
well, the system's not working. i have a frankenstien system that i threw together and found out that, oem windoze installs are tied to the cpu.
Try the alternate install CD if you don't mind, it's not very hard ( it's text based like the windows install is text based, not command line )
